item.title: Welcome to Fantasy11team.com
item.author: Rexer
item.description:
Hey! Welcome to Fantasy11test.com, itâ€™s great to have you :)

We will be providing you great tips, previews and suggestions and lastest news which help you in building a great team. Good Luck!!

There are a few things that we will be provising on this site:

  1. News about the teams, who is in the squad, who is not playing the match, who is replacing who.
  2. Expected 11 from both the teams will be provided along with suggestions about captain and vice-captain.
  3. Our dream teams will also be published to help you out in the selection.

This website has been developed using jasper2 from the github.
